title: GOP megadonors go big in battle for Congress: 5 takeaways from new campaign money filings

sentence: He said the firm’s latest polling shows a generic Republican beating a generic Democrat in three races it is tracking, but that “Kelly is leading against a generic Republican.” “Whether you agree with Mark Kelly or not politically, he has proven to be out-of-this-world in his fundraising prowess, and it’ll be key to his reelection,” Noble said in an email Monday.
author: Camila Pedrosa
title: Arizona Senate race nets $61.5 million; Kelly one of top U.S. fundraisers

sentence: He said the firm’s latest polling shows a generic Republican beating a generic Democrat in three races it is tracking, but that “Kelly is leading against a generic Republican.” “Whether you agree with Mark Kelly or not politically, he has proven to be out-of-this-world in his fundraising prowess, and it’ll be key to his reelection,” Noble said in an email Monday.
title: Arizona Senate race nets $61.5 million; Kelly one of top U.S. fundraisers – Cronkite News
